entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Ivujivik
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:59 AM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -33.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Ivujivik Airport 06:00 AM EST Monday 30 January 2023

Humidity: 70 %

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Periods of light snow. High minus 30. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of light snow late this afternoon. Local blowing snow this afternoon. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 this morning. High minus 30. Wind chill near minus 52. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 32. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of light snow. Local blowing snow. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 32. Wind chill near minus 50. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 27.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming south 20 early in the afternoon. High minus 27. Wind chill minus 46 in the morning and minus 39 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Monday 30 January 2023
